DOC.brief_summary: Investigation training effect follow 8 week high-intensity interval training ( HIT ) combination side-alternating whole-body vibration compare conventional HIT side-alternating whole-body vibration . The adaptation investigate molecular ( muscle biopsy M. vastus lateralis ) systemic ( e.g . cycling , jump mechanography , dynamometry ) level . In addition , acute effect first last training session investigate molecular ( e.g . satellite cell activation , mRNA abundance ) systemic ( e.g . ventilatory ga exchange , heart rate , rating perceived exertion ) level .
DOC.brief_title: Effects High-intensity Interval Training Combination With Side-alternating Whole-body Vibration
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : male fever / common cold beginning study 18 35 year age nonsmoker know cardiovascular orthopedic problem cardiac pacemaker fullfills healts questionnaire 's requirement Exclusion criterion : female fever / common cold beginning study age 18 oder 35y smoker cardiovascular orthopedic problem cardiac pacemaker fullfill health questionnaire 's requirement
